title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Welcome to Your National Monument National parks and monuments preserve our natural and cultural heritage for the enjoyment, education, and inspiration of this and future generations. Look here for ways to get involved, contribute, and join the National Park Service team.  We're celebrating 100 years of service in 2016! See how we're commemorating our Centennial. We work with numerous partners to accomplish our goals. Come meet them! Want to help? Here are ways you can donate, volunteer, or work at the park. Whenever we plan major projects, please tell us what you think.  There are many ways to support your park and be part of public service.  Â     Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument partners with volunteers from Astronomers of the Verde Valley each year to host numerous star parties. NPS Image
